Package de.htw.ai.loz.gpan.lpan.header

Class IphcHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.ai.loz.gpan.lpan.header.IphcHeader
  • public class IphcHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains constants and static methods to process IPv6 packets in a 6lowPAN environment. ( @link https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6282 ).
    • handling iphc dispatches
    • handling extension header dispatches
    • handling udp dispatches
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Miles Lorenz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int deCompressExtensionProtocol​(int compressed)
      Compares the given value to all possible dispatches (RFC 6282) and returns the uncompressed value or 255, if none was found.
      static int destAddressMode​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Extracts the used mode for destination address compression from the iphc dispatch.
      static byte[] generateCompressedHeader​(boolean isNextHeaderCompressed, int hopLimit, boolean isContextIdentifierExtensionUsed, boolean isSourceAddressCompressionStateful, int sourceAddressMode, boolean isMulticast, boolean isDestAddressCompressionStateful, int destAddressMode)
      Generates an iphc dispatch from the given parameters and used constants.
      static int hopLimit​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Extracts the constant for the hop limit from the iphc dispatch.
      static boolean isCompressedExtensionHeader​(int compressed)
      Compares the given value to all specified (by RFC 6282) dispatches for extension headers.
      static boolean isCompressedUpperLayer​(int compressed)
      Checks if the given value equals the udp dispatch (as only supported upper layer protocol).
      static boolean isContextIdentifierExtensionUsed​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Checks for usage of context for address compression.
      static boolean isDestAddressCompressionStateful​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Checks for usage of context for destination address compression.
      static boolean isMulticast​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Checks the iphc dispatch, if this the packet is a multicast.
      static boolean isNextHeaderCompressed​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Extracts the compression of the next header from the iphc dispatch.
      static boolean isSourceAddressCompressionStateful​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Checks for usage of context for source address compression.
      static boolean isUnCompressedExtensionHeader​(int unCompressed)
      Checks if the given value represents a compressible extension header
      static int sourceAddressMode​(byte[] packet, int headerPosition)
      Extracts the used mode for source address compression from the iphc dispatch.

    • Method Detail

      • generateCompressedHeader

        public static byte[] generateCompressedHeader​(boolean isNextHeaderCompressed,
                                              int hopLimit,
                                              boolean isContextIdentifierExtensionUsed,
                                              boolean isSourceAddressCompressionStateful,
                                              int sourceAddressMode,
                                              boolean isMulticast,
                                              boolean isDestAddressCompressionStateful,
                                              int destAddressMode)
        Generates an iphc dispatch from the given parameters and used constants.
        Parameters:
        isNextHeaderCompressed - True if next header is compressed
        hopLimit - On of the constants representing a valid hop limit compression.
        isContextIdentifierExtensionUsed - True if context is used
        isSourceAddressCompressionStateful - True if context is used for compressing the source address
        sourceAddressMode - The mode used for compressing the source address
        isMulticast - True if the destination address is a multicast address
        isDestAddressCompressionStateful - True if context is used for compressing the destination address
        destAddressMode - The mode used for compressing the destination address
        Returns:
        The generated iphc dispatch

      • isNextHeaderCompressed

        public static boolean isNextHeaderCompressed​(byte[] packet,
                                             int headerPosition)
        Extracts the compression of the next header from the iphc dispatch.
        Parameters:
        packet - A compressed not fragmented data unit
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc dispatch
        Returns:
        True if the next header is compressed

      • hopLimit

        public static int hopLimit​(byte[] packet,
                           int headerPosition)
        Extracts the constant for the hop limit from the iphc dispatch.
        Parameters:
        packet - An compressed not fragmented packet.
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc header.
        Returns:
        The constant representing the compressed hop limit

      • isContextIdentifierExtensionUsed

        public static boolean isContextIdentifierExtensionUsed​(byte[] packet,
                                                       int headerPosition)
        Checks for usage of context for address compression.
        Parameters:
        packet - An compressed not fragmented packet.
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc header.
        Returns:
        True if context is used for address compression.

      • isSourceAddressCompressionStateful

        public static boolean isSourceAddressCompressionStateful​(byte[] packet,
                                                         int headerPosition)
        Checks for usage of context for source address compression.
        Parameters:
        packet - An compressed not fragmented packet.
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc header.
        Returns:
        True if context is used for source address compression.

      • sourceAddressMode

        public static int sourceAddressMode​(byte[] packet,
                                    int headerPosition)
        Extracts the used mode for source address compression from the iphc dispatch.
        Parameters:
        packet - An compressed not fragmented packet.
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc dispatch.
        Returns:
        The mode used for source address compression

      • isMulticast

        public static boolean isMulticast​(byte[] packet,
                                  int headerPosition)
        Checks the iphc dispatch, if this the packet is a multicast.
        Parameters:
        packet - An compressed not fragmented packet.
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc dispatch.
        Returns:
        True if the packet is a multicast.

      • isDestAddressCompressionStateful

        public static boolean isDestAddressCompressionStateful​(byte[] packet,
                                                       int headerPosition)
        Checks for usage of context for destination address compression.
        Parameters:
        packet - An compressed not fragmented packet.
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc header.
        Returns:
        True if context is used for destination address compression.

      • destAddressMode

        public static int destAddressMode​(byte[] packet,
                                  int headerPosition)
        Extracts the used mode for destination address compression from the iphc dispatch.
        Parameters:
        packet - An compressed not fragmented packet.
        headerPosition - The position of the iphc dispatch.
        Returns:
        The mode used for destination address compression

      • isCompressedExtensionHeader

        public static boolean isCompressedExtensionHeader​(int compressed)
        Compares the given value to all specified (by RFC 6282) dispatches for extension headers.
        Parameters:
        compressed - The possibly compressed value of a next header parameter in an IPv6 or extension header.
        Returns:
        True if the compressed equals one of the specified (RFC 6282) dispatches for extension headers.

      • isCompressedUpperLayer

        public static boolean isCompressedUpperLayer​(int compressed)
        Checks if the given value equals the udp dispatch (as only supported upper layer protocol).
        Parameters:
        compressed - The possibly compressed value of a next header parameter in an IPv6 or extension header.
        Returns:
        True if the upper layer is compressed

      • deCompressExtensionProtocol

        public static int deCompressExtensionProtocol​(int compressed)
        Compares the given value to all possible dispatches (RFC 6282) and returns the uncompressed value or 255, if none was found.
        Parameters:
        compressed - The possibly compressed value of a next header parameter in an IPv6 or extension header.
        Returns:
        The uncompressed protocol number corresponding to the dispatch or 255.

      • isUnCompressedExtensionHeader

        public static boolean isUnCompressedExtensionHeader​(int unCompressed)
        Checks if the given value represents a compressible extension header
        Parameters:
        unCompressed - the uncompressed protocol number
        Returns:
        True if the protocol number is compressible.
